Uses of Package
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws

Packages that use com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws A framework for the Web Services (WS). 
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.wscache Joins together the caching feature and the Web Services. 
 

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws
WebServiceClient
          A minimalist contract when creating a web service client.
WebServiceClient.CallException
          The exception that will be thrown if any problem occurs during a web service call.
WebServiceClient.CallType
          Defines the way the HTTP method is run, and enables to link a call code with it.
WebServiceClient.HttpCallTypeAndBody
          Indicates the type of HTTP request and the underlying HTTP.
WebServiceClient.Verb
          An HTTP method type.
WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.IOStreamerSourceKey
          A source key which is able to define a specific URI for a business entity when it is searched on an Business.Source#IOStreamer source, i.e. through a {#link Business.IOStreamer.
WSUriStreamParser
          An abstract class which implements its interface via web service calls.
WSUriStreamParser.KeysAggregator
          A WSUriStreamParser.SourceKey aggregator, which redirects the computing of a business object entity URI depending on the Business.Source it is asked for.
WSUriStreamParser.SourceKey
          Is responsible for returning a key corresponding to a business object entity, in order to be able to access to it later on.
WSUriStreamParser.UriStreamerSourceKey
          A source key which is able to define a specific URI for a business entity when it is searched on an Business.Source#UriStreamer source, i.e. through a {#link Business.UriStreamParser.
